DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate long-term safety tolerability ACE-031 administration subject Duchenne muscular dystrophy ( DMD ) participate Study A031-03 . [ Note : This study terminate base preliminary safety data . Pending analysis safety data discussion health authority , new ACE-031 trial plan . ]
DOC.brief_title: Extension Study ACE-031 Subjects With Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy
